CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 7, 1945, pg. 14, reads: "SURPRISE! - Miss Sylvia Johnson, who will be leaving the city to reside in Washington, D. C., was given a surprise party recently at the residence of Mrs. and Mrs. Story, 132 Erin Street. Guests present were Mr. and Mrs. Lane, Mr. and Mrs. Harrington, Mr. and Mrs. Martin, Mesdames Fountain, McAllister, Woodson, Sager, and Green; Misses Davis, Pendelton, and Walker; Messrs. Wilson, Reaves, Williams, Hopewell, Baldwin, Charles, Thompson, and Private I/C Thomas. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of men and women gathered for surprise party for Sylvia Johnson, including Mr. and Mrs. Lane, Mr. and Mrs. Harrington, Mr. and Mrs. Martin, Mrs. Fountain, Mrs. McAllister, Mrs. Woodson, Mrs. Sager, Mrs. Green, Miss Davis, Miss Pendleton, Ms Walker, Mr. Wilson, Mr. Reaves, Mr. Williams, Mr. Hopewell, Mr. Baldwin, Mr. Charles, Mr. Thompson, and Private Thomas wearing military uniform, in living room of Story home, 132 Erin Street
